name: Association of International Life Offices
goal:
Representing international life insurance companies transacting cross border business under Freedom of Services and Freedom of Establishment directives throughout the EU/EEA.
A unique organisation with over 45 member companies and serving the expatriate, mobile and domestic EU / EEA communities.
Also, Members transact life assurance activities in the Middle East, Asia-Pacific region, Africa, Latin America, the UK and Eastern Europe.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives: We follow, MiFID 2, IMD 1.5 and IMD 2; PRIIPS; AEoFI (Members of Expert Group);  IGS; FTT; Gender; Taxation; VAT; the success of the Single Market in life assurance.
